data.name: CON_CONTACT_ACTIVITY.CommandText
data.value: SELECT A.*, CONTACT.CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT.CONTACT_CELLPHONE, ACTIVITY_TYPE.NAME as ACTIVITY_TYPE_NAME, ACTIVITY_STATUS.NAME as ACTIVITY_STATUS_NAME, ACTIVITY_LEVEL.NAME as ACTIVITY_LEVEL_NAME, ACTIVITY_IDENTITY.NAME as ACTIVITY_IDENTITY_NAME, ACTIVITY_EVALUATE.NAME as ACTIVITY_EVALUATE_NAME, ACTIVITY_CHILD_TYPE.NAME as ACTIVITY_CHILD_TYPE_NAME FROM CON_CONTACT_ACTIVITY A left join CON_CONTACT CONTACT ON CONTACT.CONTACT_ID = A.CONTACT_ID left join CON_CENTER CENTER ON CENTER.CENTER_ID = CONTACT.CENTER_ID left join CON_SHARECODE ACTIVITY_TYPE on ACTIVITY_TYPE.CODE_ID = A.ACTIVITY_TYPE_ID AND ACTIVITY_TYPE.FIELDNAME = 'ACTIVITY_TYPE' left join CON_SHARECODE ACTIVITY_STATUS on ACTIVITY_STATUS.CODE_ID = A.ACTIVITY_STATUS_ID AND ACTIVITY_STATUS.FIELDNAME = 'ACTIVITY_STATUS' left join CON_SHARECODE ACTIVITY_LEVEL on ACTIVITY_LEVEL.CODE_ID = A.ACTIVITY_LEVEL_ID AND ACTIVITY_LEVEL.FIELDNAME = 'ACTIVITY_LEVEL' left join CON_SHARECODE ACTIVITY_IDENTITY on ACTIVITY_IDENTITY.CODE_ID = A.ACTIVITY_IDENTITY_ID AND ACTIVITY_IDENTITY.FIELDNAME = 'ACTIVITY_IDENTITY' left join CON_SHARECODE ACTIVITY_EVALUATE on ACTIVITY_EVALUATE.CODE_ID = A.ACTIVITY_EVALUATE_ID AND ACTIVITY_EVALUATE.FIELDNAME = 'ACTIVITY_EVALUATE' left join CON_SHARECODE ACTIVITY_CHILD_TYPE on ACTIVITY_CHILD_TYPE.CODE_ID = A.ACTIVITY_CHILD_TYPE_ID AND ACTIVITY_CHILD_TYPE.FIELDNAME = 'ACTIVITY_CHILD_TYPE'

data.name: CON_CONTACT_ACTIVITY_LOG.CommandText
data.value: SELECT CASE A.LOG_STATE WHEN 'I' THEN '新增' WHEN 'M' THEN '修改' ELSE '刪除' END AS LOG_STATE_NAME,A.*, CONTACT.CONTACT_NAME, ACTIVITY_TYPE.NAME as CONTACT_AREA_NAME, ACTIVITY_STATUS.NAME as CONTACT_TYPE_NAME, ACTIVITY_LEVEL.NAME as CONTACT_TERRITORY_NAME, ACTIVITY_IDENTITY.NAME as ACTIVITY_IDENTITY_NAME, ACTIVITY_EVALUATE.NAME as ACTIVITY_EVALUATE_NAME, ACTIVITY_CHILD_TYPE.NAME as ACTIVITY_CHILD_TYPE_NAME, USERS.USERNAME from CON_CONTACT_ACTIVITY_LOG A left join USERS on A.LOG_USER=USERS.USERID left join CON_CONTACT CONTACT ON CONTACT.CONTACT_ID = A.CONTACT_ID left join CON_SHARECODE ACTIVITY_TYPE on ACTIVITY_TYPE.CODE_ID = A.ACTIVITY_TYPE_ID AND ACTIVITY_TYPE.FIELDNAME = 'ACTIVITY_TYPE' left join CON_SHARECODE ACTIVITY_STATUS on ACTIVITY_STATUS.CODE_ID = A.ACTIVITY_STATUS_ID AND ACTIVITY_STATUS.FIELDNAME = 'ACTIVITY_STATUS' left join CON_SHARECODE ACTIVITY_LEVEL on ACTIVITY_LEVEL.CODE_ID = A.ACTIVITY_LEVEL_ID AND ACTIVITY_LEVEL.FIELDNAME = 'ACTIVITY_LEVEL' left join CON_SHARECODE ACTIVITY_IDENTITY on ACTIVITY_IDENTITY.CODE_ID = A.ACTIVITY_IDENTITY_ID AND ACTIVITY_IDENTITY.FIELDNAME = 'ACTIVITY_IDENTITY' left join CON_SHARECODE ACTIVITY_EVALUATE on ACTIVITY_EVALUATE.CODE_ID = A.ACTIVITY_EVALUATE_ID AND ACTIVITY_EVALUATE.FIELDNAME = 'ACTIVITY_EVALUATE' left join CON_SHARECODE ACTIVITY_CHILD_TYPE on ACTIVITY_CHILD_TYPE.CODE_ID = A.ACTIVITY_CHILD_TYPE_ID AND ACTIVITY_CHILD_TYPE.FIELDNAME = 'ACTIVITY_CHILD_TYPE'

data.name: CON_ACTIVITY_FILE_LOG.CommandText
data.value: SELECT CASE A.LOG_STATE WHEN 'I' THEN '新增' WHEN 'M' THEN '修改' ELSE '刪除' END AS LOG_STATE_NAME,A.*, ACTIVITY.ACTIVITY_NAME, USERS.USERNAME from CON_ACTIVITY_FILE_LOG A left join USERS on A.LOG_USER=USERS.USERID left join CON_CONTACT_ACTIVITY ACTIVITY ON ACTIVITY.CONTACT_ACTIVITY_ID = A.CONTACT_ACTIVITY_ID

data.name: CON_ACTIVITY_GIFT.CommandText
data.value: SELECT CON_ACTIVITY_GIFT.*, ACTIVITY.ACTIVITY_NAME, GIFT_LEVEL.NAME as GIFT_LEVELE_NAME FROM CON_ACTIVITY_GIFT left join CON_CONTACT_ACTIVITY ACTIVITY ON ACTIVITY.CONTACT_ACTIVITY_ID = CON_ACTIVITY_GIFT.CONTACT_ACTIVITY_ID left join CON_SHARECODE GIFT_LEVEL on GIFT_LEVEL.CODE_ID = CON_ACTIVITY_GIFT.GIFT_LEVEL_ID AND GIFT_LEVEL.FIELDNAME = 'GIFT_LEVEL'

data.name: CON_ACTIVITY_GIFT_LOG.CommandText
data.value: SELECT CASE CON_ACTIVITY_GIFT_LOG.LOG_STATE WHEN 'I' THEN '新增' WHEN 'M' THEN '修改' ELSE '刪除' END AS LOG_STATE_NAME,CON_ACTIVITY_GIFT_LOG.*, ACTIVITY.ACTIVITY_NAME, GIFT_LEVEL.NAME AS GIFT_LEVEL_NAME, USERS.USERNAME from CON_ACTIVITY_GIFT_LOG left join USERS on CON_ACTIVITY_GIFT_LOG.LOG_USER=USERS.USERID left join CON_CONTACT_ACTIVITY ACTIVITY ON ACTIVITY.CONTACT_ACTIVITY_ID = CON_ACTIVITY_GIFT_LOG.CONTACT_ACTIVITY_ID left join CON_SHARECODE GIFT_LEVEL on GIFT_LEVEL.CODE_ID = CON_ACTIVITY_GIFT_LOG.GIFT_LEVEL_ID AND GIFT_LEVEL.FIELDNAME = 'GIFT_LEVEL'
